meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jed Silver Cindy Cammarn Kristen Jolley Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6607.

td.p: Jed Silver, a senior at Tufts University from the Bronx, New York
Cindy Cammarn, a junior at Bowdoin College from Charlotte, North Carolina
Kristen Jolley, a senior at the Georgia Institute of Technology from Alpharetta, Georgia

tr.td: WORLD ATHLETES
PROFESSORS
ON THE MAP
THE CRACKER BARREL
"P"ROVERBS
THE YOGI BEARS
